title: CAREER: Identifying, Enabling, and Supporting Racial Justice in Science Teaching
explanation: The term "antiracist" is used in the context of addressing exclusion of people of color, promoting equitable instruction, and discussing pedagogy. These are all inherently linked to social justice, identity, and political aims of equality.

context: advancing, supporting, and sustaining equity among elementary teachers of science there is an urgent need to expand antiracist and justice-oriented teaching that incorporates cultural and linguistic resources of learners in science classrooms. this project aims to move this orientation beyond multicultural or foundation courses in teacher education, to effectively address issues of (in)equity within education. this project
title: Advancing, Supporting, and Sustaining Equity among Elementary Teachers of Science
explanation: The term "antiracist" is used in the context of addressing issues of equity and justice within education, and promoting culturally and linguistically responsive teaching. This aligns with a political framing of the term related to social justice and power dynamics.
